text: Peggy Ann Garner (February 3, 1932-October 16, 1984) was an American actress. She acted in many movies and television programs. She acted mostly during her childhood. She was born in Canton, Ohio. She died in California from pancreatic cancer. Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Ohio Category:1932 births Category:1984 deaths
title: Peggy Ann Garner
